name: 3.20 "If Ever I Would Leave You" Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: Did Nick and Loretta split in this episode?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Nick, Carla's ex, was married to Loretta and they separated. Norm was married to Vera and while they separated it was not in this episode. Frasier was married twice but not to anyone at this point. Sam was also married in the past but has been divorced since the series started.

Carla.

	Carla was Nick's first wife. They had a love-hate relationship.

questions.text: Who offered to get Nick help?
questions.explanation:
Frasier.

	Frasier then proceeded to tell Nick that he couldn't afford his services. However he said there was a student who could take his case and get put on the map for it.

cleaning Cheers.

	Nick sank to the bottom when his wife left him and Carla wouldn't take him back. He took the job at Cheers wanting to be around Carla in hopes of winning her back.

questions.text: Why did Loretta say they split?
questions.explanation:
They outgrew each other.

	Loretta was played by Kasey Kasem's wife Jean Kasem. Loretta was the typical "dumb blonde".

questions.text: What did Nick say Sam was?
questions.explanation:
a stinkin' drunk.

	Sam was a recovering alcoholic. He had fallen off the wagon when he and Diane broke up earlier in season 3 but had since quit drinking again.

Carla.

	Carla was trying to prove that Nick would run back to Loretta if he thought she wanted him back. He started to go but then stopped, claiming he loved Carla more.

questions.text: When told he didn't smoke, how did Nick respond?
questions.correct: "I'm gonna start, I heard good things."
questions.explanation:
"I'm gonna start, I heard good things."

	Nick wanted to go with Loretta and this was his excuse for leaving. Carla saw through it however.

"I've Got You Under My Skin".

	"I've Got You Under My Skin" was song by Frank Sinatra, among many other people. When Loretta couldn't think of the title, Sam said, "I Got You Under My Skin, Loretta." To which Loretta replied, "Oh no, this will just complicate things."

questions.text: Who did Nick end up with?
questions.explanation:
Loretta.

	Carla finally decided to give Nick a chance. Just as she did, he went back to Loretta hurting Carla yet again.
